author: China Insights-SOHTV
description:
🚨 National Security Alert: Chinese-made Unitree Robotics dogs are now operating inside American law enforcement, prisons, and even military units.

A new warning from the U.S. House Select Committee on the CCP reveals alarming vulnerabilities:

📡 Remote access via a Chinese server-enabled system called CloudSail

🔓 Default password backdoor access—open to anyone

🇨🇳 Data stored in China + voice tech by iFLYTEK, a U.S.-sanctioned firm

🪖 Military-grade capabilities seen in China-Cambodia drills

Experts say these robots could be quietly transmitting data to Chinese intelligence. Is America ready for this new era of silent surveillance?

👉 SUBSCRIBE for deep dives into China’s tech influence, global espionage risks, and what U.S. institutions must do to stay ahead.

#Unitree #ChinaThreat #Surveillance #NationalSecurity #TechWarfare #CCP #AI #Robotics #USMilitary #iFLYTEK #SpyTech
title: Chinese Spy Robots in U.S. ! The Shocking Truth About Unitree.
